comments:
3.1.2 0109 build Arabic right to left

STEPS
1) Select a keybinding in the keys preference page
2) Select the whole definition in the Key Sequence section
3) Hit backspace - you will get the following entry to your log

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 2006-01-10 13:27:19.468
!MESSAGE All triggers in a trigger sequence must be an instance of Trigger
!STACK 0
